description.zh-CN: 通过滚动驱动的四阶段视觉叙事，展示从混沌到秩序的演化过程。包含实时进度追踪、3D视差效果、粒子动画系统和色彩分离特效。
description.en-US: A four-stage scroll-driven visual narrative showcasing evolution from chaos to order. Features real-time progress tracking, 3D parallax effects, particle animation system, and chromatic aberration effects.
